Class RegularEmployee

java.lang.Object
users.Employee
users.RegularEmployee
public class RegularEmployee extends Employee
Represents a regular employee in the system. Extends the Employee class and provides specific functionality for the regular employee menu and profile management.

  • Constructor Details

    • RegularEmployee

      public RegularEmployee(int ID, String Username, String Role, String Name, String Surname, String Phone, LocalDate DOB, LocalDate DOS, String Email, String Password, Boolean DEFAULT_PASSWORD)
      Constructor for the RegularEmployee class. Initializes the regular employee with the provided attributes.
      Parameters:
      ID - The employee's unique ID.
      Username - The username of the employee.
      Role - The role of the employee.
      Name - The first name of the employee.
      Surname - The surname of the employee.
      Phone - The phone number of the employee.
      DOB - The date of birth of the employee.
      DOS - The date of start of the employee.
      Email - The email address of the employee.
      Password - The password of the employee.
      DEFAULT_PASSWORD - A flag indicating whether the employee has a default password.

  • Method Details

    • Menu

      public void Menu()
      Displays the employee menu and handles user input to allow the regular employee to: 1. View their profile information. 2. Update their profile information. 3. Log out of the system. This method runs a loop that continuously displays the menu until the employee selects the option to log out (option '3').
      Specified by:
      Menu in class Employee
